about_the_game:
In the untamed lands of the Wild West, legends are written in blood and bullets. Step into the world of the Goldman family saga, spanning from father to son, and witness the highs and lows of their journey. Experience the story through their eyes.

Classic Wild West Atmosphere  

Feel the dust under your boots and the weight of your revolver. Dive into a richly crafted Wild West world filled with memorable characters, vast deserts, and outlaw towns. Every corner of this world captures the essence of a time when law was scarce, and danger was everywhere.

Comic Book Aesthetic 

Ever dreamed of stepping into the pages of a cowboy comic book? With a unique blend of nostalgia and modern twists, this game brings the iconic Wild West comics to life, but with a fresh, contemporary edge.

Hand-Painted Visuals  

Every scene feels like it was torn from the pages of a comic book. The game's hand-drawn 2D visuals are carefully crafted to enhance immersion, perfectly meshing with the post-processing effects to create a stylized but cohesive world.

A Tale of Loss and Revenge

Embark on an emotional journey as you unravel the mystery behind the disappearance of Nicholas Goldman, father to John Maxwell Goldman. The Wild West is no place for the weak, and the truth may be darker than expected.

Dual Protagonist, One Story

Every story has two sides. Experience the Goldmans’ saga from both John’s and Nicholas’s viewpoints, with the shifting perspectives offering unique insights and a deeper understanding of the unfolding narrative.

short_description: Bullet Ballet is a Wild West action FPS game that follows John Maxwell Goldman, a man searching for answers and his missing father. Set in the unforgiving frontier, this comic book-inspired journey places the fate of a father and son in the hands of the Wild West.
